body:
Hi, I think stackoverflow could be a better place to ask the question. 

As far as I known, you can use device_function with `tf.device` to manage all ops placement by yourself, see the example below:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/6f0dd0425c51360fe2be5a938a8f3fb39e420fa3/tensorflow/python/framework/graph_util_test.py#L41-L45

However, in most case, `allow_soft_placement` is good enough, see [Using a single GPU on a multi-GPU system](https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/using_gpu#using_a_single_gpu_on_a_multi-gpu_system)
